productsPage.title: Our Products
productsPage.subtitle: Professional nail care systems designed for perfection. From gel polish to builder systems, explore our complete range.

gelPolish.title: Gel Polish
gelPolish.description: Professional gel polish systems including French Collection, Solid Colours, Glitters, and complete Tops, Bases & Primers range.

builderSystems.title: Builder Systems
builderSystems.description: Advanced builder gels including 3-in-1 systems, fibreglass reinforcement, acrylics, and innovative polygel formulations.

topsBasesPrimers.title: Tops, Bases & Primers
topsBasesPrimers.description: Complete foundation and finishing systems including wipe-off and non-wipe tops, superior bases, and professional primers.

premiumQuality.title: Premium Quality
premiumQuality.description: Formulated with the finest ingredients for exceptional performance and durability.

extensiveRange.title: Extensive Range
extensiveRange.description: From classic shades to trendy colors, we offer complete product ecosystems.

professionalGrade.title: Professional Grade
professionalGrade.description: Trusted by nail technicians worldwide for salon-quality results.

factoryProcess.title: Factory Process — Behind the Scenes
factoryProcess.description: Highly pigmented professional formulas created under strict EU regulations, precision-measured, and hand-finished in our laboratory.

precisionPigmentBlending.title: Precision Pigment Blending
precisionPigmentBlending.description: Highly pigmented formulas crafted in our EU-compliant Bulgarian facility.

selfLevellingFormulation.title: Self-Levelling Formulation
selfLevellingFormulation.description: Advanced formulas for smooth, self-levelling application every time.

viscosityTesting.title: Viscosity Testing
viscosityTesting.description: Rigorous quality control ensures professional-grade performance.

privateLabelPage.title: Private Label Services
privateLabelPage.subtitle: Create your own brand with our comprehensive private label solutions. From formulation to packaging, we handle everything.

intro.title: Our Private Label Solutions
intro.description: Launch or expand your beauty brand with confidence. We offer complete private label services including custom formulations, packaging design, regulatory compliance, and quality assurance. Our minimum order quantities are competitive, and we work with brands at every stage of growth.

bottles.title: Bottles
bottles.description: Custom branded gel polish bottles in various sizes. High-quality packaging with your logo and design.

jars.title: Jars
jars.description: Premium acrylic and glass jars for builder gels, acrylics, and specialty products with custom branding.

bulkOrders.title: Bulk Orders
bulkOrders.description: Large volume production with custom formulations. Perfect for established brands scaling operations.

customFormulations.title: Custom Formulations
customFormulations.description: Work with our chemists to develop unique formulas tailored to your brand vision and market needs.

packagingDesign.title: Packaging Design
packagingDesign.description: Complete packaging solutions including bottle selection, label design, and custom printing.

regulatorySupport.title: Regulatory Support
regulatorySupport.description: Full compliance documentation including SDS, PIF, and certification for EU and international markets.

qualityAssurance.title: Quality Assurance
qualityAssurance.description: Every batch tested and certified to meet the highest industry standards before shipping.

hero.tagline: Premium Gel Polish Manufacturing & Private Label Excellence
hero.description: Professional Gel Systems • Builder Gel • Nail Art • Bulgarian Cosmetics Excellence

footer.tagline: Premium beauty products manufactured in Bulgaria, trusted by professionals worldwide.
footer.socialDescription: Connect with us on social media for the latest updates, product launches, and beauty inspiration.
